SELECT e.EMPLOYEE_NUM ,e.NAME,e.NICKNAME ,d.DEP_NAME,p.POS_NAME,d.DEP_CODE FROM EMPLOYEE e LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT d ON e.DEP_CODE = d.DEP_CODE LEFT JOIN "POSITION" p ON e.POS_CODE = p.POS_CODE WHERE e.username != #{username}
SELECT * FROM DEPARTMENT ORDER BY DEP_CODE ASC

SELECT d.DEP_NAME,p.POS_NAME,e.EMPLOYEE_NUM,e.USERNAME ,e.NICKNAME ,e.PHONE ,e.NAME FROM EMPLOYEE e LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPARTMENT d ON e.DEP_CODE = d.DEP_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN "POSITION" p ON e.POS_CODE = p.POS_CODE WHERE EMPLOYEE_NUM = #{employee_num}

SELECT d.DEP_NAME,p.POS_NAME,e.EMPLOYEE_NUM,e.USERNAME ,e.NICKNAME ,e.PHONE ,e.NAME FROM EMPLOYEE e LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPARTMENT d ON e.DEP_CODE = d.DEP_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN "POSITION" p ON e.POS_CODE = p.POS_CODE WHERE username = #{username}
